title: Cast to List
description: In Python, sometimes we need to convert a value into a list. However, if the value is already a list, we don't want to create a nested list. In this challenge, you will create a function that takes a value and returns it as a list, unless it is already a list or another iterable.

meta.title: Convert Values to Lists in Python
meta.description: Learn how to convert various data types to lists in Python using the cast_list function.
meta.keywords: python, iterable, data types, list, conversion
